name: Joe Lafiosca
bio: Joe started programming on Apple and Commodore computers as a child in the 80s and has developed software as a profession for about 15 years. Joe became a full-time JavaScript developer and AWS zealot in 2016 and came around to React Native and TypeScript in 2018. As co-founder of Nuclear Pasta, Joe works on a mobile app named Coach with the goal of helping small teams work, learn, and improve together.
